column1: From this point, you can either calculate the mass flow rate based on the total flow coefficient (Cv) and pressure differential between the Nitrogen feed and the vessel of concern using the Flow Calculations table, or you can manually input the mass flow rate in the Manual Flow Input table directly below if it is already known after selecting "Yes" in the prompt, thus bypassing the Flow Calculations table.
Is this the Design Basis Flow?
column2: =IF(C30="","Not enough info",IF(MAX(C30,C46,'[Vesssel Safety Relief Template Rev1_csvcopy.xlsm]Case 1 - External Fire'!C37,'[Vesssel Safety Relief Template Rev1_csvcopy.xlsm]Case 3 - Split Exchanger Tube'!C34,'[Vesssel Safety Relief Template Rev1_csvcopy.xlsm]Case 4 - Liquid Overfill'!C31)=C30,"Yes","No"))

column1: Is this the Design Basis Flow?
column2: =IF(C46="","Not enough info",IF(MAX(C30,C46,'[Vesssel Safety Relief Template Rev1_csvcopy.xlsm]Case 1 - External Fire'!C37,'[Vesssel Safety Relief Template Rev1_csvcopy.xlsm]Case 3 - Split Exchanger Tube'!C34,'[Vesssel Safety Relief Template Rev1_csvcopy.xlsm]Case 4 - Liquid Overfill'!C31)=C46,"Yes","No"))

column1: Calculate the ASME VIII Design Relieving Flow for every other applicable case before proceeding beyond this point.

If, after calculating the ASME VIII Design Relieving Flow for every other applicable case, this is determined to not be the Design Basis Flow, then no further calculating or modelling is necessary for this specific case.

If, after calculating the ASME VIII Design Relieving Flow for every other applicable case, this is determined to be the Design Basis Flow, you will need to model the relief line on FluidFlow or another dynamic fluid modelling software and input the results below.
The model should input the ASME VIII Design Relieving Flow into the 'design flow' field on FluidFlow (remember to ensure units in FluidFlow are correct).
A template on FluidFlow is available in the folder linked below (file-name: Case 2 Nitrogen Cntrl Fail Template).

column2: Note: you may have to open FluidFlow software first and then open the file from there

column1: Max vessel relieving pressure low enough?

column2: =IF(AND('[Vesssel Safety Relief Template Rev1_csvcopy.xlsm]Summary'!D21="Relief Valve",C65="Yes"),"Yes",IF(C65="","Not enough info",IF(AND(C65="Yes",C64="Yes"),"Yes","No")))
